amendment.description: To prohibit the use of any funds made available in this Act in a manner that is inconsistent with the trade remedy laws of the United States, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3260 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 85 - 3. Record Vote Number: 364.

action.text: Amendment SA 3260 proposed by Senator Brown. (consideration: CR S12750-12751; text: CR S12750-12751) To prohibit the use of any funds made available in this Act in a manner that is inconsistent with the trade remedy laws of the United States, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3260 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 85 - 3. Record Vote Number: 364.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3260 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 85 - 3. Record Vote Number: 364.
